image.title: Jelly Bean
image.caption: The Jelly Bean switch features a 2.5-in activation surface and is recommended for users who are able to access a smaller target area.

image.title: Blue2
image.caption: Blue2 allows you to quickly and easily connect one or two accessibility switches to your device via a Bluetooth connection.

image.title: Buddy Button
image.caption: The Buddy Button is a durable and reliable single switch that requires only the slightest touch of its 2.5-in surface for activation.

image.title: Jelly Beamer
image.caption: The Jelly Beamer Twist Transmitter is a wireless switch that brings reliable, immediate switch access without the hassle of cords.

image.title: Pouring Cups
image.caption: Mix it up with a switch-activated pouring cup that allows users to participate in cooking classes or dramatic play.

image.title: Powerlink 4
image.caption: AbleNet Powerlink 4 Switch Control Unit grants users the control of two different electrical appliances with individual switches in their switch interface.

image.title: Adaptive Scissors
image.caption: These easy-to-use switch adapted scissors make class participation and craft activities possible.

image.title: Skoog
image.caption: The Skoog is a customizable electronic musical instrument that has been designed to be inclusive and accessible â€“ especially to those unable to play conventional musical instruments.

image.title: Specs Switches
image.caption: With a 1 3/8-in activation surface, the Specs switch is small enough to be worn, but is most often used as a mounted switch.

image.title: Big Red
image.caption: The Big Red switch provides a large 5-in activation surface that activates with 5.5-oz of force.
